articles.title: Welcome to Coronation Gardens Residents Society
articles.excerpt: Welcome to our community! We're excited to launch our new website to better serve our residents and keep everyone informed about community updates.
articles.content:
Welcome to the Coronation Gardens Residents Society website! We're thrilled to launch this new digital platform to enhance communication within our community.

This website will serve as your central hub for:
- Community news and updates
- Event information
- Committee contact details
- Community guidelines
- Important announcements

We encourage all residents to bookmark this site and check back regularly for updates. If you have any questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact our committee.
articles.author: CGRS Committee

articles.title: Community Guidelines Reminder
articles.excerpt: A friendly reminder about our community guidelines to ensure everyone enjoys living in our beautiful development.
articles.content:
As we continue to grow as a community, it's important to remember our shared values and guidelines that make Coronation Gardens a wonderful place to live.

Key reminders:
- Respect for neighbors and common areas
- Proper waste management practices
- Parking regulations
- Noise considerations
- Property maintenance standards

Thank you for helping maintain our exceptional living environment!
articles.author: CGRS Committee

articles.title: Upcoming Community Meeting
articles.excerpt: Join us for our monthly community meeting to discuss important updates and share your feedback.
articles.content:
We're pleased to announce our upcoming community meeting scheduled for next month. This is a great opportunity to:

- Stay informed about community matters
